summary: The bchat system underwent testing for Claude Code integration, a comprehensive development session involving workspace cleanup, multi-provider API integration, Claude Sonnet 4 configuration, and preparation for production deployment. A trigger test was also performed to force immediate processing.

sections.title: Key Achievements
items: Proceed with workspace cleanup for the bchat system.
Integrate multi-provider APIs into the bchat system.
Configure Claude Sonnet 4 for the bchat system.
Initiate production deployment readiness for the bchat system.
